comments:
On a dstore-linux connection, create a new directory.
Select it and choose contextmenu > delete.
A dialog is shown "RSEG1063U: Unexpected error: java.lang.NullPointerException" (see below). The directory is physically deleted though.

java.lang.Exception
	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.messages.SystemMessageDialog.LogMessage(SystemMessageDialog.java:385)
	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.messages.SystemMessageDialog.open(SystemMessageDialog.java:412)
	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.messages.SystemMessageDialog.displayErrorMessage(SystemMessageDialog.java:604)
	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.view.SystemView.doDelete(SystemView.java:5093)
	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.actions.SystemCommonDeleteAction$DeleteRunnable.run(SystemCommonDeleteAction.java:152)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext.runInCurrentThread(ModalContext.java:369)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext.run(ModalContext.java:313)
This is now fixed in cvs.
